solution_line_template: The cost of the Lyft ride is ${uber_cost} - ${uber_lyft_difference} = $<<{uber_cost}-{uber_lyft_difference}={lyft_cost}>>{lyft_cost}
The original cost of the taxi ride is ${lyft_cost} - ${lyft_taxi_difference} = $<<{lyft_cost}-{lyft_taxi_difference}={taxi_original_cost}>>{taxi_original_cost}
The total cost of the ride downtown is ${taxi_original_cost} + ${tip_amount} = $<<{taxi_original_cost}+{tip_amount}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
